My Beautiful Kingdom () is a 2013 Chinese romance-comedy film on RED by HBO directed by Mak Wing-lun and starring Jiro Wang, Chrissie Chau and Chen Han-dian.
Cast
* Jiro Wang
* Chrissie Chau
* Chen Han-dian
